titleStmt.title: Epigrams diuine and morall. By Edvv. May, Gent
titleStmt.author: May, Edward, Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop, in Chancery-lane, neere the Rowles, ouer against the Suppery-office,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
